abstract: The Abkhazia National Football Team, is the national team of Abkhazia. They are not affiliated with FIFA or UEFA (AFC), and therefore cannot compete for the FIFA World Cup or the UEFA European Championships. They will compete at the first ConIFA World Football Cup in 2014.

label: Abkhazia national football team
name: Abkhazia
